languages.text: Узнав о кончине мастера плоти, Шайрэнкхей направил остатки эльдарских кораблей к самым дальним звездам Простора. Там, сокрытые от глаз людей ксенотехнологиями и колдовством, эльдары вели скромное существование и даже сумели завести немногочисленных знакомых среди доверенных мон-кай, что помогали ксеносам в обмен на знания и технологии.

When news of the death of the master of flesh reached him, Shairenkhei sent what was left of the Aeldari ships to the most distant stars of the Expanse. There, hidden from human eyes with xenotech and sorcery, the Aeldari carried on their humble existence and even managed to establish a few contacts among trusted mon-keigh, who helped the xenos in return for knowledge and technology.
languages.original_text: Узнав о кончине мастера плоти, Шайрэнкхей направил остатки эльдарских кораблей к самым дальним звездам Простора. Там, сокрытые от глаз людей ксенотехнологиями и колдовством, эльдары вели скромное существование и даже сумели завести немногочисленных знакомых среди доверенных мон-кай, что помогали ксеносам в обмен на знания и технологии.

traits.locale_text: After the news about the death of the master of flesh reached him, Shirenkhei sent what was left of Aeldari ships to the furthermost stars of the Expanse. There, hidden from the eyes of humans with xeno-tech and sorcery, Aeldari carried on their humble existence and even managed to establish a few contacts along mon-keigh their trusted, who helped xenos in return for knowledge and technology.

There, hidden from the eyes of humans with xeno-tech and sorcery, Aeldari carried on their humble existence and even managed to establish a few contacts along mon-keigh their trusted, who helped xenos in return for knowledge and technology.

There, hidden from human eyes with xenotech and sorcery, the Aeldari carried on their humble existence and even managed to establish a few contacts among trusted mon-keigh, who helped the xenos in return for knowledge and technology.

There, hidden from human eyes with xenotech and sorcery, the Aeldari carried on their humble existence and even managed to establish a few contacts among trusted mon-keigh, who helped the xenos in return for knowledge and technology.

When news of the death of the master of flesh reached him, Shairenkhei sent what was left of the Aeldari ships to the most distant stars of the Expanse. There, hidden from human eyes with xenotech and sorcery, the Aeldari carried on their humble existence and even managed to establish a few contacts among trusted mon-keigh, who helped the xenos in return for knowledge and technology.

languages.text: 当血肉大师死亡的消息传到榭伦凯的耳中时，他带领残存的艾达灵族来到了科罗努斯扩区中最遥远的星球。在那里，艾达灵族通过异形科技与巫师避开了人类的视线，维持着他们平静的生活。他们甚至与一部分值得信赖的人类成功联系了互惠关系，那些人通过帮助艾达灵族来换取知识和技术。
languages.original_text: When news of the death of the master of flesh reached him, Shairenkhei sent what was left of the Aeldari ships to the most distant stars of the Expanse. There, hidden from human eyes with xenotech and sorcery, the Aeldari carried on their humble existence and even managed to establish a few contacts among trusted mon-keigh, who helped the xenos in return for knowledge and technology.

traits.locale_text: 当血肉大师死亡的消息传到榭伦凯的耳中时，他带领残存的艾达灵族来到了科罗努斯扩区中最遥远的星球。在那里，艾达灵族通过异形科技与巫师避开了人类的视线，维持着他们平静的生活。他们甚至与一部分值得信赖的人类成功联系了互惠关系，那些人通过帮助艾达灵族来换取知识和技术。

languages.text: Als ihn die Kunde vom Tod des Meisters des Fleischs erreichte, schickte Shairenkhei die Überreste der Aeldari-Schiffe zu den entferntesten Sternen der Ausdehnung. Dort setzten die Aeldari ihre bescheidene Existenz fort, durch Xenotech und Hexerei vor menschlichen Blicken verborgen. Es gelang ihnen sogar, einige Kontakte zu vertrauenswürdigen Chem-Pan-Sey aufzubauen, die den Xenos im Tausch gegen Wissen und Technologie halfen.
languages.original_text: When news of the death of the master of flesh reached him, Shairenkhei sent what was left of the Aeldari ships to the most distant stars of the Expanse. There, hidden from human eyes with xenotech and sorcery, the Aeldari carried on their humble existence and even managed to establish a few contacts among trusted mon-keigh, who helped the xenos in return for knowledge and technology.

traits.locale_text: Als ihn die Kunde vom Tod des Meisters des Fleischs erreichte, schickte Shairenkhei die Überreste der Aeldari-Schiffe zu den entferntesten Sternen der Ausdehnung. Dort setzten die Aeldari ihre bescheidene Existenz fort, durch Xenotech und Hexerei vor menschlichen Blicken verborgen. Es gelang ihnen sogar, einige Kontakte zu vertrauenswürdigen Chem-Pan-Sey aufzubauen, die den Xenos im Tausch gegen Wissen und Technologie halfen.

languages.text: Lorsque Shairenkhei apprit la mort du maître de la chair, il envoya ce qui restait des vaisseaux aeldaris aux étoiles les plus lointaines des Étendues, où ils se cachèrent des humains grâce à leur xénotechnologie et leur sorcellerie. Les Aeldaris poursuivirent ainsi leur humble existence et parvinrent même à nouer des relations avec des mon-keigh de confiance qui les aidèrent en échange de savoir et de technologie.
languages.original_text: When news of the death of the master of flesh reached him, Shairenkhei sent what was left of the Aeldari ships to the most distant stars of the Expanse. There, hidden from human eyes with xenotech and sorcery, the Aeldari carried on their humble existence and even managed to establish a few contacts among trusted mon-keigh, who helped the xenos in return for knowledge and technology.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque Shairenkhei apprit la mort du maître de la chair, il envoya ce qui restait des vaisseaux aeldaris aux étoiles les plus lointaines des Étendues, où ils se cachèrent des humains grâce à leur xénotechnologie et leur sorcellerie. Les Aeldaris poursuivirent ainsi leur humble existence et parvinrent même à nouer des relations avec des mon-keigh de confiance qui les aidèrent en échange de savoir et de technologie.

languages.text: Cuando le llegó la noticia de la muerte del maestro de la carne, Shairenkhei envió los restos de las naves Aeldari a las estrellas más lejanas de la Extensión. Allí, protegidos de la mirada de la Humanidad con xenotecnología y hechicería, los Aeldari continuaron con su existencia humilde e incluso consiguieron establecer contacto con mon-keigh de confianza, que ayudaron a los xenos a cambio de conocimiento y tecnología.
languages.original_text: When news of the death of the master of flesh reached him, Shairenkhei sent what was left of the Aeldari ships to the most distant stars of the Expanse. There, hidden from human eyes with xenotech and sorcery, the Aeldari carried on their humble existence and even managed to establish a few contacts among trusted mon-keigh, who helped the xenos in return for knowledge and technology.

traits.locale_text: Cuando le llegó la noticia de la muerte del maestro de la carne, Shairenkhei envió los restos de las naves Aeldari a las estrellas más lejanas de la Extensión. Allí, protegidos de la mirada de la Humanidad con xenotecnología y hechicería, los Aeldari continuaron con su existencia humilde e incluso consiguieron establecer contacto con mon-keigh de confianza, que ayudaron a los xenos a cambio de conocimiento y tecnología.

languages.text: 屍肉の主の訃報が届くと、シャイレンケイは残されたアエルダリ船をエクスパンスの中でも最も遠い星々へと送った。そこで異星技術と魔術で人間の目から隠れながら、アエルダリはつつましく生き続け、知識と技術の代わりに異種族に手を貸してくれた信頼できるモン＝ケイの間でわずかな人脈を築くことにも成功した。
languages.original_text: When news of the death of the master of flesh reached him, Shairenkhei sent what was left of the Aeldari ships to the most distant stars of the Expanse. There, hidden from human eyes with xenotech and sorcery, the Aeldari carried on their humble existence and even managed to establish a few contacts among trusted mon-keigh, who helped the xenos in return for knowledge and technology.

traits.locale_text: 屍肉の主の訃報が届くと、シャイレンケイは残されたアエルダリ船をエクスパンスの中でも最も遠い星々へと送った。そこで異星技術と魔術で人間の目から隠れながら、アエルダリはつつましく生き続け、知識と技術の代わりに異種族に手を貸してくれた信頼できるモン＝ケイの間でわずかな人脈を築くことにも成功した。

languages.text: Et üstadının ölüm haberini alan Shairenkhei, kalan Aeldari gemilerini Enginlik'in en ücra yıldızlarına gönderdi. Orada zeno teknolojisi ve büyü ile insanların gözlerinden gizlenen Aeldariler, mütevazı bir yaşam sürüp hatta bilgi ve teknoloji karşılığında zenolara yardım eden birkaç güvenilir mon-keigh'le temas kurmayı bile başardı.
languages.original_text: When news of the death of the master of flesh reached him, Shairenkhei sent what was left of the Aeldari ships to the most distant stars of the Expanse. There, hidden from human eyes with xenotech and sorcery, the Aeldari carried on their humble existence and even managed to establish a few contacts among trusted mon-keigh, who helped the xenos in return for knowledge and technology.

traits.locale_text: Et efendisinin ölümüne dair haberler ona ulaştığında Shairenkhei, Aeldari gemilerinden geriye kalanları Enginlik'in en ücra yıldızlarına gönderdi. Orada zeno teknoloji ve büyü ile insanların gözlerinden gizlenen Aeldariler, mütevazı bir yaşam sürdüler ve hatta bilgi ve teknoloji karşılığında zenolara yardım eden birkaç güvenilir mon-keigh'le temas hâlinde olmayı bile başardılar.
